title: Inflation rate forecast ( CPI ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) Q3 2019 to Q1 2024
summary: This bar chart has 19 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Inflation rate forecast in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Inflation rate forecast is highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
There is a difference of 0.28 between the maximum Quarter Q3 2019 and minimum Quarter Q2 2020.
min_summary: This bar chart has 19 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Inflation rate forecast in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Inflation rate forecast is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 19 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Inflation rate forecast in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Inflation rate forecast is highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
There is a difference of 0.28 between the maximum Quarter Q3 2019 and minimum Quarter Q2 2020.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Inflation rate forecast for 19 number of Quarters.
The Inflation rate forecast is highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q2 2020.
The second highest Inflation rate forecast is appeared to be the Quarter Q4 2019.
There is a difference of 0.28 between the maximum Quarter Q3 2019 and minimum Quarter Q2 2020.
The Quarter Q3 2019 has the highest Inflation rate forecast, followed by Q4 2019, and Q2 2022. Down to the Quarter Q2 2020 which is the lowest.
Over the past 19 Quarters, the Inflation rate forecast has grew.
Quarter Q1 2024, Q4 2023, Q3 2023, Q2 2023, Q1 2023, Q4 2022, Q3 2022, and Q2 2022 share the same value 2.0.
Considered together, the average Inflation rate forecast in all 19 Quarters is roughly 1.97.
